value: You are at the coast near the Nothingthere village. A fisherman is scrubbing his boat.
You are in the small bay near the Nothingthere village. The sea current brings here lots of debris.
You got to a small house hidden in the forest, some distance away from the village. An elder woman sits on the porch, reading some book.
You got a job helping some fishermen.
You search for some time but find nothing.
You find a human skeleton. Near it lies a rusty spear. It may be useful.
You find a human skeleton. Near it lies a rusty spear. You don't have space to take it right now
